abstract: Belgian police raid nine homes and detain 10 people suspected to be part of Islamic State recruitment network; some arrests are  made in Molenbeek neighborhood, where several men involved in Paris attacks were based, though police say raids are not directly related.
lead_paragraph: The arrests in Brussels were not directly connected to the Paris terrorist attacks last year, an official said.

headline.main: Belgian Police Charge 3 in Investigation of ISIS Network
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Belgium: Police Seek ISIS Recruiters

snippet: The arrests in Brussels were not directly connected to the Paris terrorist attacks last year, an official said.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
